item.Q:
Write the character:
1: to seem; to appear; to resemble; similar; -like; pseudo-
2: similar
item.A:
1: sì 2: shì
相似 xiāngsì to resemble; similar; like; resemblance; similarity 近似值 jìnshìzhí approximant

item.Q:
Write the character:
exactly; in good order; whole; complete; entire; in order; orderly; to repair; to mend; to renovate; to make sb suffer; to punish; to fix; to give sb a hard time
item.A:
zhěng
整个 (整個) zhěnggè whole; entire; total

item.Q:
Write the character:
to pull (to draw a bow); to draw or stretch sth; to attract; to lead; to divert (water); to guide
item.A:
yǐn
引起 yǐnqǐ to give rise to; to lead to; to cause; to arouse

item.Q:
Write the character:
team; class; squad; work shift; classifier for groups; ranking; surname
item.A:
bān
班长 (班長) bānzhǎng class monitor; squad leader; team leader

item.Q:
Write the character:
bewilder; crazy about; fan; enthusiast; lost; confused
item.A:
迷 (strokes unavailable)
mí
迷信 míxìn superstition

item.Q:
Write the character:
diagram; to plan; picture; drawing; chart
item.A:
traditional: 圖
tú
企图 (企圖) qǐtú attempt

zhì
控制 kòngzhì control; to exercise control over; to contain

item.Q:
Write the character:
to cost; to spend; fee; wasteful; expenses; surname
item.A:
traditional: 費
fèi
消费 (消費) xiāofèi to consume

item.Q:
Write the character:
to compete; competition; match
item.A:
traditional: 賽
sài
比赛 (比賽) bǐsài competition (sports etc); match

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: strange; odd; weird; wonderful
2: odd (Num)
item.A:
奇 (strokes unavailable)
1: qí 2: jī
刘少奇 (劉少奇) LiúShàoqí Liu Shaoqi (1898–1969), Chinese communist leader 奇数 (奇數) jīshù odd number

traditional: 識
shí
意识 (意識) yìshí consciousness; awareness; consciously (i.e. deliberately); to be aware

item.Q:
Write the character:
model; type (e.g. blood type)
item.A:
型 (strokes unavailable)
xíng
类型 (類型) lèixíng type

item.Q:
Write the character:
to exceed; overtake; surpass; transcend; ultra-; super-; to pass; to cross
item.A:
chāo
超过 (超過) chāoguò to surpass; to exceed; to outstrip

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: side; edge; margin; border; boundary
2: suffix of a noun of locality
item.A:
traditional: 邊
1: biān 2: bian
一边 (一邊) yībiān one side; either side; on the one hand; on the other hand; doing while 外边 (外邊) wàibian (n) outside; (n) exterior surface; (n) place other than one's home town

耶 (strokes unavailable)
yē
耶和华 (耶和華) Yēhéhuá Jehovah

conduct; grade; thing; product; good
item.A:

shè

虽 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 雖
suī

shǐ

item.Q:
Write the character: yùn
(yùndòng de yùn)
item.A:
traditional: 運
to move; to transport; to use; to apply; fortune; luck; fate
运动 (運動) yùndòng movement; campaign; sports

traditional: 運動
yùndòng movement; campaign; sports

traditional: 開始
kāishǐ begin; beginning; start; initial
zhìdù (political or administrative) system or institution

traditional: 雖然
suīrán although; even though
yǐnqǐ to give rise to; to lead to; to cause; to arouse

traditional: 認識
rènshi be acquainted with (a person); to know; to be familiar with; to recognize

traditional: 整個
zhěnggè whole; entire; total

traditional: 超過
chāoguò to surpass; to exceed; to outstrip

traditional: 品種
pǐnzhǒng breed; variety
zhìdìng to draw up; to formulate

traditional: 知識
zhīshi intellectual; knowledge-related; knowledge
zuòpǐn works (of art)

traditional: 運用
yùnyòng to use; to put to use

traditional: 一邊
yībiān one side; either side; on the one hand; on the other hand; doing while

traditional: 比賽
bǐsài competition (sports etc); match
xiāngsì to resemble; similar; like; resemblance; similarity
lǐjiě to comprehend; understanding; comprehension; to understand

traditional: 大多數
dàduōshù (great) majority
jiējìn near; close to

traditional: 重視
zhòngshì to attach importance to sth; to value
